title: Designating  Businesses  as  Secondary  Businesses  of  Strategic  Importance
decision_details:
- The  Proposals  made  by  the  Hon.  President  in  his  capacity  as  the  Minister  of  Investment  Promotions  to  designate  the  following  businesses  as  Secondary  Businesses  of  Strategic  Importance  under  the  provisions  of  the  Colombo  Port  City  Economic  Commission  Act  No.  11  of  2021  and  to  grant  exemptions  and  incentives  proposed  through  the  Acts  stated  under  Schedule  II  of  the  above  Act  to  the  said  businesses  and  to  publish  the  Orders  for  the  same  through  the  Notifications  published  in  the  Government  Gazette,  were  approved  by  the  Cabinet.  

    • Horizon  Group  USA  Global  LLC.
    • Satguru  Travel  and  Tourism  LLC.
    • Pagero  Lanka  Software  Engineering  (Pvt)  Ltd.
    • KPMG  Professional  Services  (Private)  Ltd.
    • Hexaware  Technologies  SL  (Private)  Ltd.
    • Creative  Software  (Pvt)  Ltd.
    • Remediumone  Global  Private  Limited.
    • GTN  Group  Holding  Limited.
    • IPD  Colombo  (Private)  Limited.
    • Bistec  Solutions  (Pvt)  Ltd.
    • Port  City  Duty  Free  (Pvt)  Ltd.
    • China  Duty  Free  (Lanka)  (Pvt)  Ltd.
    • ODF  Pte  Ltd.
